abilities.name: Firestarter
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fire Stream
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
